content.prompt: The Battle of Antietam, September 17, 1862, is considered pivotal to the outcome of the Civil War because it

choices.label: represented the Union’s deepest thrust into southern territory
resulted in the border states joining the Confederacy
marked the first use of Black troops by the Union army
confirmed George McClellan’s status as the leading Union general

topic.text: 5.8: Military Conflict in the Civil War

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
